description: Remember Xenogears? A turn-based RPG from the height of Squaresoft's dominance in the 1990s, it combined sci-fi and fantasy elements and a whole lot of mental illness troubles with giant mechs wailing on each other. It was pretty cool, and now you can bring a little part of that into your life with Square Enix's model kit of the Siebzehn, one of the titular "Gears" of Xenogears. Amazon has the Xenogears Siebzehn model kit on sale for only $97.16 (was $150). Though the MSRP for this model kit is $150, it was selling for around $170 on Amazon earlier this year.
title: Square Enix's Xenogears Model Kit Is Over $50 Off At Amazon

description:
The new Agents of Sabotage update has been released in Grand Theft Auto Online and it delivers a slew of content for fans to dive into. The main chunk of content in the update comes in the form of jobs given to you by a former FIB agent named Jodi. This happens after you purchase the Darnell Bros Garment Factory and speak with Pavel.

The jobs you can complete range from stealing vehicles to multi-step crimes that involve killing military agents and selling off their goods. There are four jobs you can complete right out of the gate in Agents of Sabotage, and the first priority file you have access to is called The Brute Force File. In this
title: GTA Online: How To Complete The Brute Force File In Agents Of Sabotage

description:
Overwatch 2 Season 14 has arrived, bringing the newest hero to the roster, Hazard the tank. In addition to the new season, the Winter Wonderland event is also live, adding a variety of holiday themed skins to the shop, including the Happy Holly Mercy skin. Season 14 also marks the arrival of the Avatar: The Last Airbender crossover event, which adds a variety of themed skins and cosmetics on December 17.

The battle pass itself includes 80 tiers of free and premium rewards, including Mobster Hazard, Cozy Sojourn, Celestial Mei, and Odin Sigma. It also includes 80 Mythic Prisms, which can be used to get the newest Mythic skin, Thor Reinhardt
title: Overwatch 2 Battle Pass Season 14: All Skins, Emotes, And Rewards

description:
There are several ways for your characters to receive new abilities and buffs in Path of Exile 2. The most common and straightforward way of doing so is to use Uncut Skill Gems, which give your character new skills and upgrade existing ones. You can also use the Passive Ability skill tree as well as Uncut Support Gems to further buff your skills. However, one buff that flies under the radar comes from Uncut Spirit Gems, which have their system from the basic Skill and Support Gems.

To see how to get Uncut Spirit Gems and how the Spirit mechanic works in Path of Exile 2, take a look at the guide below.

How Spirit works in Path of Exile 2

While you might want to earn more Uncut Spirit Gems, it's important to know what you're actually doing with them. Spirit Gems can be socketed into different Spiri
title: Path Of Exile 2: How To Get Uncut Spirit Gems

description:
In addition to recognizing some of the greatest games of the past year, The Game Awards is also a celebration of all the fantastic games to come. Each December, we are treated to plenty of jam-packed showcases filled with reveals, updates, and even a few surprise releases. One such showcase is Wholesome Snack, which offers a bite-sized look at some of the coziest titles currently in production.

This year, Wholesome Games brought 24 games front and center, with genres ranging from fantasy RPGs and adventure puzzlers to life sims and match-three games. Below is everything shown at this year's Wholesome Snack showcase, as well as links to their respective Steam pages and a bit more about what adventures they hold.


A Waddleful
title: Every Game Announced At The Game Awards Wholesome Snack Showcase

description:
Assassin's Creed Shadows will bring players to feudal Japan when the game arrives early next year. As you might expect, swords and knives will be a big part of the arsenal for Shadows' two main characters, Naoe and Yasuke. However, neither character will be solely reliant on their primary weapons to dish out death.

Ubisoft has shared a lengthy overview of combat in Assassin's Creed Shadows, which also reveals the tools that the lead characters will use in battle. According to Ubisoft, players' choice of weapons and characters "dramatically alters combat" in this game. The first character, Naoe, is a shinobi/ninja, and she'll have a katana, a ball-and-chain weapon known as a kusarigama, and a tanto dagger that allows her to make quick strikes and double as
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Will "Dramatically" Alter How It Plays Based On Your Character And Weapons

description:
Last year, beer company Heineken introduced the Gaming Fridge, a PC with a fridge installed, but now it wants to put the power to get a Heineken 0.0--its non-alcoholic beer--into players' hands with its Cool Down Controller. Heineken 0.0 launched the controller at CCXP24, a Comic-Con event in Brazil, where fans could see the device in action.

Designed and conceptualized by creative agency LePub Sao Paulo and Milan in partnership with Heineken 0.0, the control is said to know when to "refresh" players during high-pressure moments via advanced sensors that monitors both button pressure and movement intensity. When things become too heated, the controller's light shifts from green to red, triggering a special delivery service that automatically sends a Heineken 0.0 to everyone on the player's team.
title: Heineken Made A Game Controller To Bring You (Non-Alcoholic) Beer
Babylon 5 Complete Series & Animated Film Get Limited-Time Discounts At Amazon

description:
The Agents of Sabotage update has gone live in Grand Theft Auto Online, giving players some new content to explore before the new year arrives. The update is centered around the Darnell Bros Garment Factory, which you can now buy and establish as your own personal headquarters. From here, you can work with a former FIB agent to take on jobs and make some serious cash. However, GTA Online doesn't do the best job of explaining how to get started with the Agents of Sabotage update.

Starting Agents of Sabotage in GTA Online

You can initially begin the update by accepting a call from Pavel, a new Russian friend who calls you moments after you enter GTA Online once the new update is installed. Pavel mentions an investment opportunity regarding the Darnell Bros Garment Factory and then hangs up.

After Pavel hangs up, you can bring up your phone and navigate to the MazeBank Foreclosures site. Here, you ne
title: GTA Online: How To Start Agents Of Sabotage

description:
PlayStation has revealed the PlayStation 2024 Wrap-Up, a tool that provides a summary of your year on PS4 and PS5. This year, the Wrap-Up features a retro aesthetic to celebrate PlayStation's 30th anniversary.

PlayStation 2024 Wrap-Up will continue to update and track your profile through the end of December, until it goes away on January 10. The Wrap-Up will show your various stats such as most games played, monthly gaming stats, habits, and more.

It'll also show you what year your profile was made, as well as other historical statistics. These include the total number of games you've played since the creation of your PSN account and the number of trophies you've earned.
title: You Can Now Check Out Your PlayStation 2024 Wrap-Up

description:
A new update has arrived to both Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 And Warzone. The December 10 patch notes include major weapon changes across all modes, making adjustments to weapon motion and idle sway, as well as buffing headshot damage for several guns in Black Ops 6.

According to the patch notes, the update makes adjustments to the weapon motion and idle sway for all Black Ops 6 weapons. This includes reductions to visual recoil, turn sway, and idle sway, as well as less weapon bob from motion.

We've made reductions to weapon motion across the board today to improve the combat experience.
title: CoD: Black Ops 6 And Warzone Patch Notes Detail Huge Weapon Improvements Across All Modes

description:
Outriders and Bulletstorm developer People Can Fly has announced that it has let go 120 employees, as well as scaled down some of its self-publishing projects.

In a statement on Twitter, People Can Fly CEO Sebastian Wojciechowski said, "Today, we made a very difficult decision to reduce our self-publishing strategy by suspending Project Victoria, scaling down our team Project Bifrost, and restructuring some of our supporting teams at People Can Fly."

He blames the external pressures of the video game industry and that the layoffs were necessary as those pressures persisted beyond the studio's forecast. As a result, the studio is now doubling down on new work-for-hire engagements and focusing on development of a single independent game.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Outriders Developer Scales Down Self-Publishing Projects And Lays Off 120 Employees

description:
The Sorceress is one of the six classes available to players in the early access build of Path of Exile 2. While it may not be the strongest class, you can turn the Sorceress into a boss-killing machine with the right skills and playstyle. Below, we've put together all the recommended Skill and Support Gems, Passives, and Ascendancy you should use with the Sorceress, as well as a brief overview of the class.

Sorceress Overview in Path of Exile 2

As a Sorceress, you can wield a few different weapons that give you access to a variety of different spells. These spells can be slotted into your binds without having to spend an Uncut Skill Gem on them. Sorceresses can use wands, staffs, and sceptres. Wan
title: Path Of Exile 2: Best Sorceress Build Guide

description:
BioWare has released a free timed trial for Dragon Age: The Veilguard, allowing anyone with an EA Play subscription to check out the game for a limited time at no extra cost. EA Play is included with Game Pass Ultimate, so subscribers to that service get this, too.

The timed trial lets you play the full game, but only for a period of five hours. Time spent in the in-game character creator counts toward the five hours, but you can use the standalone character creator tool to create a hero outside of the game and then import them from the same device/console.

EA Play by itself costs $6/month or $40/year. EA Play Pro, meanwhile, costs $17/month or $120/year. EA Play Pro members get all manner of extras for The Veilguard, including cosmetics and armor sets.
title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard Free Trial For EA Play Members Is Out Now

description:
CD Projekt Red has released a new update for Cyberpunk 2077, and like previous patches, this one makes some significant changes to several features in the game. Focused on player expression through cars, photography, and character customization, Update 2.2--which has been developed alongside French support studio Virtuos--is now available for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S versions of the game.

You can read the full patch notes through this link, but for a quick look at the biggest changes, you can catch all the highlights below.

One thing you won't see in this update if you're on PS5?
title: Here's What Cyberpunk 2077's Unexpected 2.2 Update Is Bringing

description:
This year marks the 10th anniversary of Assassin's Creed Unity, the eighth game in Ubisoft's long-running franchise. The game was set in Paris during the French Revolution in the late 18th century, and it included a meticulous recreation of the city, including the famous Notre Dame cathedral. However, Ubisoft admitted to taking some liberties with Notre Dame's appearance in a recent video timed to coincide with the reopening of the cathedral five years after it was devastated by a fire.

As related in the video above, the decision was made to include Notre Dame's icon
title: Assassin's Creed Unity Bends History As Ubisoft Celebrates Notre Dame's Reopening

description:
Each year, the task of narrowing down our favorite games to a list of just the 10 best is challenging, and 2024 is no exception. Whether it's brilliant expansions to existing games, the continued development of live-service games that have kept us hooked, innovative new twists on established genres, or masterful takes on what we thought was well-trod territory, 2024 has been filled with outstanding experiences.

We feel our list is best served by being composed of not just new, standalone releases, but also expansions and live-service games that continue to evolve. Our criteria for what's eligible here are simple: games and expansions that have been released since December of last year, when we decided on 2023's best, as well
title: GameSpot's 10 Best Games Of 2024

description: <
title: Gran Turismo 7 For PS5 Is Only $20 At Walmart Right Now - Lowest Price Yet

description:
One of the deepest cuts on the Marvel Rivals launch roster, Jeff the Land Shark, is both an adorable Strategist, and an unstoppable killing machine. Jeff, a member of the modern Young Avengers. Is exactly what his name implies, which is a shark with feet that can go on land. In Marvel Rivals, Jeff is a strong healer who can also hold his own against strong damage dealers like Spider-Man and Magik. Plus, he's darn cute, which makes him a popular pick.


Jeff the Land Shark overview
title: Marvel Rivals Jeff The Land Shark Hero Guide
The Penguin: Season One Is Coming To 4K Blu-Ray, Preorders Now Live

description: 8BitDo makes some of the best third-party peripherals for consoles and PC, including a burgeoning series of mechanical keyboards. Just like many of its controllers, 8BitDo's Retro Mechanical Keyboards are inspired by classic video game hardware. The NES-themed edition was one of the first models, and it remains the most popular--though the upcoming transparent green Xbox-themed edition might have something to say about that. If you love Nintendo and are in the market for a mechanical keyboard, Best Buy's Deal of the Day slashes $30 off the retailer's exclusive N Edition bundle, which comes with a detachable arcade stick. You can
title: NES-Themed 8BitDo Wireless Keyboard With Joystick Is Just $70 Today Only (December 10)

description:
Monument Valley 3, the third entry in the indie puzzle game series, is out today, exclusively on Netflix Games.

In an interview with GamesIndustry.biz, developer Ustwo spoke about its history with mobile platforms and how introducing live-service elements to Monument Valley 3 was a natural transition. Usetwo is planning to release new content for Monument Valley 3 with every real-life season, along with new activities and puzzles on a regular basis. Previous games in the series had DLC.

"But for Monument Valley, [we've] always done downloadable content. It's just less rhythmic, less predictable, when they come out," explained director Jennifer Estaris. "And so for me, it was about. How do we make that a healthy habit for playe
title: Monument Valley 3 Is Out Today On Netflix With A Live-Service Twist

description: Several first-party PlayStation games have found their way to PC over the past few years, and now’s your chance to pick them up for cheap. A handful of PlayStation Studios PC games are discounted at Amazon ahead of the holidays, all of which are offered as digital Steam keys--making this a great time to pile a few more games into your ever-growing Steam library. The only caveat? Most of these deals are exclusive to Amazon Prime members. Consider signing up to cash in on the deals, however, as you’ll also gain access to free shipping, the impressive Prime Video catalog, monthly free games via Prime gaming, and tons of other benefits.
title: PlayStation Studios PC Games Are Steeply Discounted For Amazon Prime Members

description:
No longer are YouTube Playables titles relegated to solo experiences. Google has revealed that it's testing out multiplayer functionality for the free games library, which is found on the YouTube website or in the app.

For starters, YouTube is seeing how real-time multiplayer works with two Playables titles: Ludo Club and Magic Tile 3. The former is similar to the Sorry board game and can be played with three other people from around the world. There is even simple chat functionality, such as selecting an angry emoji or saying, "Hello." This new feature works in browsers and on mobile devices, and Google teases there is more stuff on the way for Playables, too.

It's been over a year since YouTube first rolled
title: YouTube Adds Multiplayer Functionality To Playables Game Library

description: The adorable Sackboy: A Big Adventure is now available on PC for just $12.59 (was $60) at Amazon, one of its lowest prices ever. It’s offered as a Steam key, though you’ll need to be an Amazon Prime member to cash in on the massive discount. If you're not already a member, consider signing up to earn free shipping, access to Prime Video, and other useful benefits.
title: Sackboy For PC Is Only $12.59 At Amazon, PS5 Special Edition With Plush Is $50

description:
In the absence of any official information about the Switch 2--or whatever Nintendo decides to call its next system--fans are grasping on to any morsel of possible news, and another piece has now emerged.

As reported by GamesRadar, peripheral company Satisfye apparently posted and deleted a trailer for the ZenGrip 2, and the video might have included a very blurry look at what might be the Switch 2 with the peripheral attached. Like previou
title: Fans Believe This Could Be A Blurry Look At The Switch 2

description:
After an 11-year gap between games, Path of Exile 2 got off to a hot start earlier this month with its early-access period. Although fans have responded very favorably to the game so far, Path of Exile 2 developer Grinding Gear Games has already taken in player feedback for some post-launch changes.

In a post on Path of Exile 2's official site, the developer noted that some of the most pressing issues have already been addressed with a new update, while others will be fixed in an upcoming patch. One area that Grinding Gear is moving more cautiously on is item-drop frequency. To give players more rewards, the number of rare monsters is being increased, while more valuable drops can be earned from defeating the extra-difficult rare monsters that appear later in the game.

Some of the a
title: Path Of Exile 2 Devs Promise To Make Game More Rewarding With New Update

description:
Following its week post-launch, Marvel Rivals has its first patch of fixes, which will help with many of the environmental and audio issues currently in the game. The free-to-play online shooter pits some of Marvel's biggest guns--pun intended--against each other to take down Dr. Doom and Doom 2099. Patch 1 handles a lot of on-the-surface issues, but affects a few heroes including Dr. Strange. You can check out the full list below.

The big issue that was addressed involved players getting stuck on certain maps after being hit close to the edge. However, as the bug happens across multiple maps and areas, it might still be an issue elsewhere now.

"However, further adjustments may still be needed to fully resolve the issue," the recent blog post read. "So we ask for your understanding while we continue looking into it and working on
title: First Marvel Rivals Patch Fixes A Ton of Environmental Bugs So You're No Longer Stuck

description:
The Super Mario Bros. Movie is getting a sequel, but the character Foreman Spike may not be part of it. Comedian and actor Sebastian Maniscalco, who voiced the character in the first film, recently discussed the possibility of coming back for the sequel, and he's not feeling very optimistic.

Maniscalco said he went to a Universal Studios theme park with his kids and hoped to show his children a stuffed animal based on Foreman Spike. However, the store didn't have one, and the lack of merchandise for his character leads Maniscalco to believe Foreman Spike is not set to return.

"No Spike, no nothing. It stopped at me. It was every other character, and then me, I have no animal, no stuffy, no nothing. So, the fact that I didn't have a stuffed animal is not giving me a lot of confidence that I'm coming back for the sequel. I haven't heard anything, so your guess is as good as mine," he told
title: This Super Mario Bros. Movie Character May Not Be In The Sequel

description:
Amazon and Games Workshop have announced that they've reached a final agreement regarding the creative guidelines for adapting the Warhammer 40K universe into several different films and television series.

Man of Steel star Henry Cavill, who's in charge of producing and starring in the show, posted on Instagram that he had been recently busy workshopping the different characters and lore to adapt. "Our combined efforts have led us to a fantastic place to start our Universe, which has been agreed upon by those up on high at both Amazon and Games Workshop," he explained. "That starting place shall, for now, remain a secret."

Warhammer 40K developer Games Workshop also said in a community update post that the
title: Amazon's Warhammer Series With Henry Cavill Could Finally Be Entering Development

description:
New information continues to come to light about the suspect in the brazen killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, including a connection to the world of video games. The suspect, 26-year-old Luigi Mangione, worked at Civilization studio Firaxis Games, a spokesperson confirmed to Polygon.

What appears to be Mangione's LinkedIn page states that he worked as a UI programming intern at Firaxis from May 2016-August 2017; he said he fixed more than 300 UI bugs in the game. Also in 2016, Mangione's alleged LinkedIn page says he was the founder and president of "Upgrade," a game development and research team at the University of Pennsylvania.

Following his Firaxis internship, Mangione's subsequent career roles were seemingly outside of the g
title: Alleged UHC Shooter Once Interned At Civ Studio

description:
Recently, voice actor Doug Cockle revealed that Geralt would be in The Witcher 4, but he's now walking back those comments after he was "slapped" by developer CD Projekt Red for saying anything in the first place. At the MCM Comic Con Birmingham event recently, Cockle said his original comments were based on "a rumor," and he claims he doesn't know if Geralt will actually be in The Witcher 4.

"I did go online and I said something about this, and then I got slapped by CD Projekt because… I don't know how true it is," he said, as reported by GamesRadar. "I went off a rumor--I thought I'd seen somebody from CD Projekt say that Geralt will be in Witcher 4 but he won't
title: Witcher Actor Says, On Second Thought, He's Not Sure If Geralt Is Actually In Witcher 4

description:
In 2014, Polish game developer 11 Bit Studios released This War of Mine, a war game that defied genre conventions by placing players in the role of desperate characters whose only goal was to survive. For the 10th anniversary of the game's release, 11 Bit Studios is inviting players back to the game with a new DLC, Forget Celebrations, which is raising money for multiple charities.

This War of Mine: Forget Celebrations will be available on Steam on December 11, with all proceeds going to War Child, Amnesty International, Liberty Ukraine, and Indie Games Poland Foundation. The DLC will place players in control of Katia, one of the supporting characters from the main game's storyline. For this story, Katia is now a veteran war correspondent and an author who is attempting to write about
title: This War Of Mine Marks 10th Anniversary With New Charity DLC

description:
Next year will mark the 10th anniversary of The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, CD Projekt Red's smash hit that has spanned two console generations. Even during The Witcher 3's development, CD Projekt Red was paving the way for its futuristic follow-up title, Cyberpunk 2077. Now, a new report suggests that The Witcher 3 almost had a direct crossover with Cyberpunk 2077 in a quest that would have temporarily sent Geralt of Rivia to Night City.

This revelation comes from a new eBook series, What Lies Unseen, a multi-volume chronicle of the development of The Witcher 3 by modders and data miners Crygreg, Ferroxius, and Glassfish. According to the first volume of the book, the quest called Through Time and Space originally had Gera
title: The Witcher 3 Almost Had A Cyberpunk 2077 Crossover
DualSense PS5 Controllers Get Big Discounts - New Chroma Model For Only $54 At Amazon

description:
According to Google's stats, the Silent Hill 2 remake was the top trending search for game walkthroughs in 2024.

Google has released its 2024 Year In Search Top Trending Data report, showcasing the top trending search results for the year.

Google shares this data annually, showing how Google's trending topics change year over year. Trending topics may not necessarily be the most-searched overall topics in a given year, but making the list does mean a topic (or in this case, a game) has picked up a significant amount of search interest relative to last year, which is often a sign that the topic has become culturally significant.

This year, Google has released both a list of the top ten trending games and the top 10 trending game walkthroughs of 2024. Keep scrolling for
title: These Are The Top Trending Games Of 2024

description:
Shopping for a Lego fan this year, but want to get them something more unique than a traditional set of bricks? Then check out the surprisingly long list of Lego jigsaw puzzles up for grabs. These are standard jigsaw puzzles featuring images of Lego products--making them a cool alternative for the holidays. Most are 1,000 pieces and are quite large when completed, though others are holiday bundles that include multiple puzzles of a smaller size. Better yet, some are currently discounted.

From ice cream and minifigures to pets and gardens, here’s a closer look at the best Lego jigsaw puzzles you can buy ahead of the holidays. These should all arrive in time for Christmas, but double-check your delivery date if timing is important.


Lego Masterpiece Puzzle: Mona Lisa (1,000 pieces)
title: These Lego Jigsaw Puzzles Are A Great Holiday Gift Idea
